name: Penalty
text:
§852-2  Penalty.  Any person who refuses or wilfully fails to move as directed by such officer shall be fined not more than $200 or imprisoned not more than six months, or both. [L Sp 1949, c 9, §2; RL 1955, §297-2; HRS §754-2; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1]
 
Cross References
 
  Classification of offense and authorized punishment, see §§701-107, 706-640, 706-663.
